entry.content: 软件开发流程

entry.title: VocabularyDay02
entry.content:
1. jolly：
/ˈdʒɒl.i/
adj.兴高采烈的，快活的

a jolly smile 开心的微笑
a jolly mood 愉快的心情
Everybody was in a very relaxed and jolly mood.
每个人的心情都很轻松愉快。

令人愉快的，惬意的
a jolly occasion 令人愉快的场合
a jolly evening 令人愉快的夜晚

明亮好看的（bright and attractive）
I love the bright yellow you’ve painted the children’s room - it makes it look really jolly.
我喜欢你给孩子的房间涂刷的明黄色—这使它看上去十分明亮悦目。

adv.很，非常 = very
That’s a jolly nice scarf you’re wearing.
你戴的围巾很漂亮。
Sounds like a jolly good idea to me.
对我来说是个非常好的主意。
It was all jolly good fun.
这一切都很有趣。

v.通过使某人心情愉快并温和地劝说某人去做某事，怂恿（to encourage someone to do something by putting that person in a good mood and persuading them gently）
I’ll try to jolly my parents into letting me borrow the car this weekend.
我会试着哄父母周末把汽车借给我。

2. lad：
/læd/
n.男孩；少年；小伙子

A group of young lads were standing outside the shop.
一群小青年站在商店外面。

He’s a nice lad.
他是个很不错的小伙子。

3.lass：
/læs/ =lassie/ˈlæsi/
n.女孩，姑娘

lads and lasses (= boys and girls)
小伙子们和姑娘们

4. kidnap：
/ˈkɪd.næp/
v.绑架；劫持

The wife of a businessman was kidnapped from her home in London last night.
昨天晚上一个商人的妻子在她伦敦的家中遭到了绑架。

n.绑架；劫持
He denies attempted murder and kidnap.
他否认对其谋杀未遂和绑架的指控。

5. abort：
/əˈbɔːrt/
v.中止；使夭折；使中途失败

The plan had to be aborted at the last minute.
计划被迫在最后一刻取消。

（通常指通过手术）堕胎，人工流产
to abort a pregnancy 终止妊娠
The virus can cause pregnant animals to abort.
这种病毒可能导致怀孕动物流产。

流产，小产（是miscarry的另一种说法）

6. abortion：
/əˈbɔː.ʃən/
n.（通常指通过手术进行的）堕胎，人工流产

She decided to have/get an abortion.
她决定接受人工流产。
Abortion is restricted in some American states.
美国一些州禁止堕胎。

失败
This project is a complete abortion.
这个项目彻底失败了。

7. heroin：
/ˈherəʊ.ɪn/
n.海洛因

She died from a heroin overdose.
她死于过量吸食海洛因。

8. query：
/ˈkwɪə.ri/
n.疑问，问题（a question, often expressing doubt about something or looking for an answer from an authority）

If you have any queries about your treatment, the doctor will answer them.
您如果对治疗有任何疑问，医生将会做出解答。

v.提问；质问，怀疑
A few students have queried their marks.
有几个学生对他们的分数表示疑惑。

9. carve：
/kɑːrv/
v.刻，雕刻

He carved her name on a tree.
他将她的名字刻在了树上。

把（熟肉）切成小片，切成块
Would you like me to carve (the chicken)?
您要我（把鸡肉）切成小块吗？

10. carving：
/ˈkɑː.vɪŋ/
n.雕刻品；雕刻图案；雕刻技艺

wooden carvings 木雕
stone carvings 石雕

entry.title: VocabularyDay01
entry.content:
1. ego：
/ˈiː.ɡəʊ/ plural egos
n.自我评价；自我中心；自负；自尊心

That man has such an enormous ego - I’ve never known anyone so full of themselves!
那个人自负得要命—我从来没有见过这么自以为是的人。

2. egoism：
/ˈiːɡəʊ.ɪ.zəm/ = egotism /ˈiː.ɡə.tɪ.zəm/
n.自我主义；自大；自负

Finding herself world-famous by the time she was 18 only encouraged the actress’s egotism/egoism.
年仅18岁就闻名世界只是让这位女演员变得更加自负了。

3. egoist：
/ˈiː.ɡəʊ.ɪst/ = egotist/ˈiː.ɡə.tɪst/
n.自我主义者；自高自大者；自私自利者

Politicians are notorious egoists.
政客们是一帮臭名昭著的自我主义者。

4. notorious：
/nəʊˈtɔː.ri.əs/
adj.臭名昭著的，声名狼藉的

The company is notorious for paying its bills late.
该公司出了名地喜欢拖欠账单。
He was notorious for his violent and threatening behaviour.
他因暴力和威胁行为而臭名昭著。

5. indulge：
/ɪnˈdʌldʒ/
v.（使）沉溺于；（尤指）放纵，沉迷

I love wine but I don’t often indulge myself.
我爱喝红酒，但一般都有节制。
The soccer fans indulged their patriotism, waving flags and singing songs.
足球迷们摇着旗唱着歌，纵情抒发他们的爱国热情。
纵容
My aunt indulges the children dreadfully.
我婶婶太纵容孩子们了。

6. indulgence：
/ɪnˈdʌl.dʒəns/
n.沉溺；放纵；嗜好；爱好；享受

Chocolate is my only indulgence.
巧克力是我唯一的嗜好。
All the pleasures and indulgences of the weekend are over, and I must get down to some serious hard work.
周末的快乐时光和享受都结束了，我得认真处理一些棘手的工作。
允许，溺爱；迁就；纵容
There is no limit to the indulgence he shows to his grandchildren.
他无度地溺爱娇惯孙子孙女。

7. indulgent：
/ɪnˈdʌl.dʒənt/
adj.迁就的；纵容的；宽容的

an indulgent smile
宽容的微笑
He had been a strict father but was indulgent to/towards his grandchildren.
他曾是个严厉的父亲，但对孙子孙女却很纵容。

8. patriot：
/ˈpætriət/，/ˈpeɪtriət/
n.爱国者

Many terrorists consider themselves to be patriots fighting for freedom.
许多恐怖分子认为自己是为自由而战的爱国者。

9. patriotic：
/pætrɪˈɔtɪk/ ，/peitrɪˈɔtɪk/
adj.爱国的；有爱国心的

patriotic songs
爱国歌曲

10. patriotism：
/ˈpætriə.tɪ.zəm/ ，/ˈpeɪ.triə.tɪ.zəm/
n.爱国主义；爱国精神

He was a country boy who had joined the army out of a sense of patriotism and adventure.
他是个乡下小伙儿，参军是出于爱国之心和冒险精神。

entry.title: 开业大吉

tags.tag: 此处记录赵海棠第一次成功开通博客！
